data.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
data.ingredient: Spaghetti, minced beef, tomato sauce, onions, garlic, olive oil, salt, pepper
data.process: Boil spaghetti. In a pan, sauté onions and garlic, add minced beef and cook. Add tomato sauce and simmer. Combine with spaghetti.

data.name: Chicken Curry
data.ingredient: Chicken, curry powder, coconut milk, onions, garlic, ginger, salt, pepper
data.process: Cook chicken in a pan. Add onions, garlic, and ginger, and sauté. Add curry powder and coconut milk. Simmer until thick.

data.name: Caesar Salad
data.ingredient: Lettuce, croutons, parmesan cheese, Caesar dressing, chicken breast
data.process: Grill chicken and slice. Toss lettuce, croutons, parmesan, and Caesar dressing in a bowl. Top with chicken slices.

data.name: Vegetable Stir Fry
data.ingredient: Carrots, broccoli, bell peppers, soy sauce, garlic, ginger, sesame oil
data.process: Heat sesame oil in a pan. Add garlic and ginger. Stir-fry vegetables. Add soy sauce and cook for 5 minutes.

data.name: Pancakes
data.ingredient: Flour, milk, eggs, sugar, butter, baking powder, vanilla extract
data.process: Mix all ingredients into a batter. Heat butter in a pan. Pour batter to form pancakes. Flip and cook both sides.

data.name: Beef Stroganoff
data.ingredient: Beef, mushrooms, onions, sour cream, butter, flour, beef broth, salt, pepper
data.process: Sauté beef and mushrooms in butter. Add onions and cook. Stir in flour, broth, and sour cream. Simmer until thickened.

data.name: Tacos
data.ingredient: Tortillas, ground beef, lettuce, tomato, cheese, taco seasoning, salsa
data.process: Cook beef with taco seasoning. Warm tortillas. Assemble tacos with beef, lettuce, tomato, cheese, and salsa.

data.name: Margarita Pizza
data.ingredient: Pizza dough, tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, fresh basil, olive oil
data.process: Spread tomato sauce on dough. Add mozzarella. Bake in oven. Top with fresh basil and drizzle olive oil.

data.name: Minestrone Soup
data.ingredient: Vegetable broth, pasta, beans, carrots, celery, tomatoes, onions, garlic, olive oil
data.process: Sauté onions and garlic in olive oil. Add vegetables, broth, and pasta. Simmer until tender. Add beans and cook for 10 more minutes.

data.name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
data.process: Butter the bread slices. Place cheese between slices. Grill in a pan until golden brown on both sides.

data.name: Chicken Alfredo
data.ingredient: Fettuccine pasta, chicken breast, heavy cream, parmesan cheese, garlic, butter
data.process: Cook pasta. Sauté chicken and garlic in butter. Add cream and parmesan to make the sauce. Combine with pasta.

data.name: Tomato Basil Soup
data.ingredient: Tomatoes, basil, garlic, onions, vegetable broth, olive oil, salt, pepper
data.process: Sauté onions and garlic. Add tomatoes and broth. Simmer, then blend. Add basil and simmer for 5 more minutes.

data.name: Fish Tacos
data.ingredient: Tortillas, fish fillets, cabbage, lime, sour cream, salsa, taco seasoning
data.process: Season fish with taco seasoning and grill. Warm tortillas. Assemble tacos with fish, cabbage, sour cream, and salsa.

data.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
data.ingredient: Flour, sugar, butter, eggs, chocolate chips, baking soda, vanilla extract
data.process: Mix all ingredients into dough. Spoon onto a baking sheet. Bake until golden brown.

data.name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
data.ingredient: Bell peppers, ground beef, rice, tomato sauce, cheese, garlic, onions, salt, pepper
data.process: Cut tops off bell peppers and remove seeds. Cook beef with onions and garlic. Mix with rice and tomato sauce. Stuff peppers and bake.
